name: Spider Solitaire -trump game
description:
"Spider Solitaire" is a card game to create stacks of cards with few moves.You will make 8 sets of stacks of A through K.
* Records the number of times you have played and scored!

10 columns of cards will be provided facing down.The cards at the bottom will be facing up.

The rest will be placed at bottom right corner of the table as a stock.You can place one card on each column facing up as you want, when there are cards on all the columns.

You can move your card and put them in the order "K, Q, J, 10,... 3, 2, A".If you have a row which has an order such as "6, 5, 4", you can move them all at once.If there is no cards in a row, you can put any cards you want.

Solitaire trump game!
